title: ! Bed Available in Coliving Community!
posting_body: Join our little community in this great 21-unit building in the heart of San Francisco.
Within walking distance from Downtown, Financial District, Union Square and more!
Just blocks from both freeway entrances.
Bed in a double occupancy room available now at only $745/month.
Room has shared bathrooms, a shared kitchen/social area, and laundry onsite.
Images in post are sample images.
Come take a look at your new home today!
Application fee $30, Credit requirements 650, Income to Rent 3:1
